description.narrative: The goal of the project is to reduce poverty in the ECOWAS region through increased access to modern energy services. The specific objective of the project is to increase transmission capacity between Nigeria, Benin, Togo and Ghana for trading of electricity which will improve reliability of supply, reduce production costs and, during drought periods, meet shortfall in output of hydropower stations.

participating-org.narrative: GOVERNMENT OF GHANA (MULTINATIONAL) MINISTRY OF FINANCE
